# List


## Installation

```
npm install @metlife-apac/list
```

## Usage

```
<List
  className=""
  collapsedSize=""
  data={[
    {
      id: 'branch',
      label: 'Branch',
      value: ''
    },
    {
      id: 'name',
      label: 'Name',
      value: ''
    }]}
  renderItem={() => {}}
  collapsedSize={2}
  keyExtractor={() => {}}
  hideDivider=true
  emptyMsg={null}
/>
```

[metlife ui standard]: https://design.metlife.com/resources/design-standards-kits/ui-standards/
